intro: ^Mrcalindas?Smiling "Ah. I'm happy you walked in, I want to ask you a question for a change. But first, how are you,

s: ^Doing really well, Mr. Calindas. The Block party is really coming along!
^Doing really well, actually. I'm looking forward to our next cooking lesson.

Chat1: ^Mrcalindas?Smiling "It really is. I hear that you've got a bouncy castle, local food vendors, and everything. My grandson cannot stop talking about it. He's so excited he talks about it every night."

s: ^That's amazing. I used to love the bouncy castle at all of our old parties, so if he's excited I'm excited.
^That's so good to hear. He sounds like me when I think about our cooking lesson.

Chat2: ^Mrcalindas?Smiling "Well, that's good. The neighborhood is starting to feel more connected. This Block Party has made everyone feel really good about where Bloomwood is heading."

s: ^That's so nice to hear, Mr. Calindas. Oh, before I forget, what did you need to ask me?

QuestIntro: ^Mrcalindas?Neutral "Oh, yes. Bad news. I need to move out next cooking lesson. My mother has moved in with us, and I want her to feel settled."
^Mrcalindas?Neutral "So it's going to be a while before our next lesson. I need to figure out how to make sure she settles in."

s: ^Oh, that's okay, Mr. Calindas. I'm excited to meet your Mom!
^Oh, that's okay, Mr. Calindas. How can I help out?

QuestDetails1: ^Mrcalindas?Neutral "Well, she is a very fiesty 72 year old lady. She's very used to being active. Since my father passed she's been lonely and I thought living closer to us would be for the best."

s: ^Well, that sounds like a great plan. Did you need any help settling her in?
^I would love to help if you need anything.

QuestDetails2: ^Mrcalindas?Neutral "My mother is leaving behind many of her friends so it would be nice to find her good people her own age to talk to."
^Mrcalindas?Neutral "I want her mind to stay sharp, and since she's been a bit depressed I'm worried. I don't know the first place to look for any of that, and I don't have a lot of time to prepare."

s: ^I can help with that! Do you want me to find some senior activity resources for Mother Calindas?
^Hmm. I think I can help with that. Do you want me to look for you?

QuestAcceptance: ^Mrcalindas?Smiling "That would save me so much time,
^Mrcalindas?Smiling "Also, I would love to learn more about the resources there are to keep her fit and active! Thank you so much for helping and understanding."

s: ^It would be my pleasure to welcome her to the neighborhood. I'll be back with some ideas.
^I can't wait to meet her and welcome her to the neighborhood.

Goodbye: ^Mrcalindas?Smiling "I'm sure she'll be happy to meet you too. I'm going to go tell Lucy you're helping out. Talk to you soon!"

s: ^Tell Mrs. Calindas I said hi! See you soon!
